data.text: Half of the world's 1.3 billion poor people are children, according to Multidemensional Poverty Index just released by @UNDP: https://t.co/I9qKtlJyVS #GlobalGoals https://t.co/CD6T2bxKnq

Globally, the percentage of people living in extreme poverty has fallen to a new low of 10% - but progress in reducing the poverty rate is slowing: https://t.co/f8C8EtbGM4 via @WorldBank #GlobalGoals https://t.co/Dp9hoPTXt7

303 million 5 to 17-year-olds are out-of-school. The #GlobalGoals aim to get every child in school & learning by 2030. https://t.co/frG12mwpzA

57 million primary age children remain out of school. The #GlobalGoals aim to ensure that all boys and girls receive quality primary and secondary education by 2030. https://t.co/4LPaezguyW https://t.co/dtNG3LI5s7

For many countries, the end of tuberculosis as an epidemic & public health problem remains an aspiration rather than a reality. Today & every day, let's unite to #EndTB! https://t.co/knm1YmeCPZ via @WHO #globalgoals https://t.co/tAoT7r5CJJ

"His light of idealism, integrity & action continues to illuminate our hearts and, indeed, the very soul of the UN." -- @antonioguterres remembering former Secretary-General Dag Hammarskjöld on the anniversary of his death. https://t.co/qyT2wgN3Xq https://t.co/qz1byKjMX3

Thank you @Twitter for launching the #UNGA emoji as world leaders head to NYC for the UN General Assembly! Use it to join the conversation. https://t.co/FHtK5Z78Bh

The 73rd session of #UNGA will officially open on Tuesday in NYC with @mfespinosaEC of Ecuador as @un_pga. She is the 4th woman to hold that position ➡️ https://t.co/c98TT3ktk3 https://t.co/00LKYZWQaS
